metadata.title: CVE-2024-3574 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In scrapy version 2.10.1, an issue was identified where the Authorizationheader, containing credentials for server authentication, is leaked to athird-party site during a cross-domain redirect. This vulnerability arisesfrom the failure to remove the Authorization header when redirecting acrossdomains. The exposure of the Authorization header to unauthorized actorscould potentially allow for account hijacking.

criterions.comment: python-scrapy package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
